SEARCH

Class QuestifyApplication

java.lang.Object
QuestifyApplication
public class QuestifyApplication extends Object
This is our application. It has a GUI, but isn't the gui. It runs on the main thread. This creates the other threads.

  • Constructor Details

    • QuestifyApplication

      public QuestifyApplication()
      Default constructor, debug is false. Debug gives access to debug handler

    • QuestifyApplication

      public QuestifyApplication(boolean debugMode)
      Parameters:
      debugMode - enter the debug mode and receive error messages. When false, same as default constructor.

  • Method Details

    • openGui

      public void openGui()
      openGui Opens the ApplicationGUI, and begins the debug thread if necessary.

    • getAllWindowPreferences

      private WindowPreferences[] getAllWindowPreferences()
      Helper method. QuestifyGUI can only see and interact with WindowStates that it understands. WindowStates must come embedded in a Preferences Object, with a reserved, unique, WindowStateName. All window states are added here, then switched to and managed in accordance with their preferences, and the preferences of other WindowStates.
      Returns:
      an array of all the WindowPreferences for the WindowStates.
